questions.question: How many columns have more than 5% missing values, and which columns are they? Provide your answer as a JSON object with keys "count" (integer) and "columns" (list of column names, alphabetically sorted).
questions.hint: Calculate the missing‑value percentage for each column and identify those exceeding a 5% threshold.
questions.output_schema: A JSON object with exactly 2 keys: "count" (integer) and "columns" (list of column names, alphabetically sorted). Example: {"count": 3, "columns": ["col_a", "col_b", "col_c"]}

questions.question: How many columns have more than 10% missing values? Provide your answer as a JSON object with exactly two keys: "count" (an integer) and "columns" (a list of column names, alphabetically sorted).
questions.hint: Calculate the missing-value percentage for each column and select those exceeding the 10% threshold.
questions.output_schema: A JSON object with exactly 2 keys: "count" (integer) and "columns" (list of column names, alphabetically sorted). Example: {"count": 3, "columns": ["col_a", "col_b", "col_c"]}
